verses.name: Luke 4:25
verses.text: But I tell you of a truth, many widows were in Israel in the days of Elias, when the heaven was shut up three years and six months, when great famine was throughout all the land;

verses.name: Luke 4:26
verses.text: But unto none of them was Elias sent, save unto Sarepta, a city of Sidon, unto a woman that was a widow.

verses.name: Luke 4:27
verses.text: And many lepers were in Israel in the time of Eliseus the prophet; and none of them was cleansed, saving Naaman the Syrian.

verses.name: Luke 4:28
verses.text: And all they in the synagogue, when they heard these things, were filled with wrath,
